item.title: General clean up of estate
item.description: General clean and tidy up of estate will be kicking off on the 5th April 2022 at 7pm, meeting at the park entrance (between 62+63) Bring a brush/spade/wheel barrow/rubber gloves and yourself! This will continue on a weekly basis We understand people are busy and may not suit everyone, so please feel to maintain your area whenever possible Date 05-04-22 7pm
